<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# RegOpt Node Formatting

Represents flags of the regex literal (i.e. `mix` for `/foo/mix`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
/depreciate/imx
```

After:

```ruby
/depreciate/imx
```

## Lets the parser choose the order

Before:

```ruby
/depreciate/mix
```

After:

```ruby
/depreciate/imx
```
